keyMoments.title: Isshi-20 Doctors Debut
keyMoments.description: The Isshi-20, a group of twenty highly skilled doctors serving Wapol, make their first appearance. They quickly treat Wapol's injuries sustained from Dalton's attack.
keyMoments.significance: Represents the corrupted medical system of Drum Island under Wapol's rule - elite doctors serving only the king while the people suffer.

reveals.information: Twenty elite doctors serving under Wapol
Highly skilled medical professionals capable of treating severe injuries rapidly

keyMoments.title: Dalton Confronts Wapol
keyMoments.description: Dalton stands up to confront Wapol and demands he leave Drum Island, preparing to fight to protect the island despite being outnumbered.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Dalton's transformation from loyal soldier to heroic protector of the people.
keyMoments.quote: Wapol! Leave this island at once! You are no longer welcome here!

keyMoments.title: Dalton's Devil Fruit Named
keyMoments.description: Dalton transforms into his human-bison hybrid form and his Devil Fruit is officially identified as the Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison by Wapol's soldiers.
keyMoments.significance: First time Dalton's Devil Fruit is officially named in the anime, showcasing the first standard Zoan transformation focused on speed and agility.

keyMoments.title: Dalton Shields Villagers from Arrows
keyMoments.description: Dalton selflessly shields villagers from Chess's arrows, taking multiple hits himself and becoming severely wounded.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates his evolution from soldier to true protector of the people, cementing his role as Drum Island's guardian.

abilities.description: Transforms into a human-bison hybrid with enhanced speed and agility, capable of creating afterimages.

relationships.description: Former servant turned enemy. Dalton now opposes Wapol's tyrannical rule and fights to keep him from returning to power.

evolutionMoments.description: Dalton directly confronts Wapol, declaring he is no longer welcome on Drum Island.

reveals.information: Confirmed to have eaten the Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison
Willing to sacrifice his life to protect Drum Island's people from Wapol's return

keyMoments.title: Luffy Rescues Baby Lapin's Parent
keyMoments.description: Despite his urgent mission and already carrying two people, Luffy stops to help a baby Lapin rescue its parent trapped in the avalanche snow.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's compassion even toward creatures that just attacked him, establishing goodwill with the Lapahns.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Begins Climbing with Both Nami and Sanji
keyMoments.description: With Sanji critically injured, Luffy decides to carry both Sanji and Nami up the sheer Drum Rockies in freezing conditions.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most physically demanding feats Luffy has attempted, showcasing his determination to save his crew at any cost.
keyMoments.quote: Don't worry! I'll get you both to a doctor!

keyMoments.title: Sanji Sacrifices Himself in Avalanche
keyMoments.description: Sanji heroically hurls Luffy and Nami out of harm's way and takes the full brunt of the avalanche himself, dislocating his spine.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Sanji's protective nature and willingness to sacrifice himself for his crew, especially to protect Nami.
keyMoments.quote: Luffy! Take Nami and get to safety!

reveals.information: Dislocates spine from avalanche impact, rendering him unable to fight for the rest of the arc

keyMoments.title: Wapol's Forces Land at Bighorn
keyMoments.description: Former King Wapol arrives at Bighorn with his crew, intending to reclaim his throne after being driven away by Blackbeard.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the major conflict for the remainder of the Drum Island arc.

keyMoments.title: Chess's Arrow Attack on Dalton
keyMoments.description: Chess targets villagers trying to help Dalton, forcing Dalton to shield them and take multiple arrow hits.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chess's tactical ruthlessness and willingness to target civilians to gain advantage.

abilities.description: Skilled archer capable of firing multiple arrows simultaneously with deadly accuracy.

reveals.information: Demonstrated expert archery skills, able to fire multiple arrows at once
